keyMoments.title: Chinjao Defeats Jean Ango
keyMoments.description: After Jean accidentally hits him with weapons meant for Luffy, Chinjao delivers a powerful headbutt, knocking Jean out of the ring.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chinjao's formidable power despite his flattened head.

keyMoments.title: Chinjao's Grudge Against Garp Revealed
keyMoments.description: Chinjao reveals that Garp flattened his drill-shaped head 30 years ago, destroying his ability to access his treasure and vowing revenge on Garp's descendants.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Chinjao's motivation for fighting Luffy and adds depth to Garp's legendary past.
keyMoments.quote: Garp crushed my head 30 years ago! I'll never forgive him or his grandchildren!

keyMoments.title: Haki Clash with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Chinjao and Luffy charge at each other, both using Armament Haki. Their clash creates a massive shockwave that knocks away all remaining competitors.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chinjao's mastery of Armament Haki and sets up their climactic battle.

bounties.reason: Former legendary pirate with bounty over 500 million berries

abilities.description: A martial art that allows the user to control vibrations in their body to generate shockwaves that enhance physical attacks.
Chinjao can harden his body parts with Armament Haki, as shown in his clash with Luffy.
Chinjao possesses Conqueror's Haki, though not shown in this episode.

relationships.description: Chinjao holds a deep grudge against Garp for flattening his drill-shaped head 30 years ago, which prevented him from accessing his treasure.

evolutionMoments.description: Chinjao reveals his grudge against Garp and extends it to Luffy as Garp's grandson.

relationships.description: Chinjao targets Luffy as a way to get revenge against Garp, viewing him as the enemy's descendant.

evolutionMoments.description: Chinjao confronts Luffy in Block C, explaining his grudge against Garp and his intent to harm Garp's grandchildren.

relationships.description: Sai is Chinjao's grandson and current leader of the Happo Navy.

reveals.information: Garp flattened Chinjao's drill-shaped head 30 years ago during a battle
Chinjao possesses Armament Haki and Hasshoken martial arts
Chinjao wants revenge against Garp and his descendants for ruining his ability to access his treasure

keyMoments.title: Jake Jake no Mi Revealed
keyMoments.description: Kelly reveals his Jake Jake no Mi Devil Fruit power, transforming into a jacket that his brother Bobby wears to combine their strengths.
keyMoments.significance: First reveal of the Jake Jake no Mi's unusual ability to transform into wearable clothing.
keyMoments.quote: I ate the Jake Jake no Mi! I'm a Jacket Human!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Sai
keyMoments.description: After defeating Boo using Bobby's strength, Kelly is confronted by Sai who blocks his attacks and defeats him with a powerful kick.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that despite his Devil Fruit power, Kelly is outmatched by skilled fighters like Sai.

abilities.description: Kelly can transform into a jacket that others can wear, allowing him to control their body and utilize their physical abilities.
A barrage of rapid punches used while merged with Bobby.

relationships.description: Bobby is Kelly's younger brother who serves as the physical powerhouse for their combat combination.

reveals.information: Kelly ate the Jake Jake no Mi, becoming a Jacket Human
The Funk Brothers became infamous in the underworld by defeating pirates worth over 100 million berries

keyMoments.title: Funk Brothers' Combination Revealed
keyMoments.description: Bobby puts on Kelly as a jacket, combining Bobby's immense strength with Kelly's speed and skill to create a formidable fighter.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the unique combat strategy of the Funk Brothers using the Jake Jake no Mi.

relationships.description: Kelly is Bobby's older brother who uses Bobby's body as a host for his Jake Jake no Mi powers.

reveals.information: Bobby possesses immense physical strength that complements Kelly's Devil Fruit ability

keyMoments.title: Sai Defeats Kelly Funk
keyMoments.description: Sai avenges Boo's defeat by blocking Kelly's attacks and defeating him with a vicious kick.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sai's combat skills and his loyalty as a leader who protects his subordinates.
keyMoments.quote: As a leader, I will always avenge my men!

keyMoments.title: Prepares to Fight Ideo
keyMoments.description: After defeating Kelly Funk, Sai prepares to face off against Ideo, the Destruction Cannon.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up a battle between two skilled martial artists in Block C.

keyMoments.title: Hasshoken Fighting Style Shown
keyMoments.description: Sai demonstrates the Hasshoken martial arts style of the Happo Navy and Kano Country.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a unique fighting style that uses vibrations to create shockwaves.

abilities.description: A martial art that controls vibrations to generate shockwaves that enhance physical attacks.

relationships.description: Chinjao is Sai's grandfather and former leader of the Happo Navy.
Boo is Sai's brother and vice-leader of the Happo Navy.

reveals.information: Sai is a master of Hasshoken martial arts
Sai is a loyal leader who avenges his subordinates when they are defeated

keyMoments.title: Boo Defeated by Kelly Funk
keyMoments.description: Boo easily defeated Kelly Funk initially but was then beaten by Bobby merged with Kelly, requiring medical treatment afterward.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the danger of underestimating opponents with Devil Fruit abilities.

relationships.description: Sai is Boo's brother and current leader of the Happo Navy.

keyMoments.title: Jean Ango's Bounty Hunter Career Revealed
keyMoments.description: Jean reveals he captured many Impel Down escapees over the past two years and still intends to capture Buggy, Jinbe, Crocodile, Ivankov, and Shiryu.
keyMoments.significance: Connects to the Impel Down arc and shows the aftermath of the mass prison break.
keyMoments.quote: I've turned in almost all of the prisoners that broke out of Impel Down!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Don Chinjao
keyMoments.description: After accidentally hitting Chinjao with weapons meant for Luffy, Jean is knocked out of the ring by Chinjao's powerful headbutt.
keyMoments.significance: Eliminates Jean from the tournament and demonstrates Chinjao's power.

abilities.description: Jean uses various weapons in combat, throwing them with precision.

reveals.information: Jean is a successful bounty hunter who captured many Impel Down escapees
Jean knows about the Level 6 prisoners' escape from Impel Down, information that was never publicly announced

keyMoments.title: Ideo Eliminates Competitors
keyMoments.description: Ideo is shown taking out opponents with his explosive punches during Block C competition.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Ideo's power and his epithet as 'Destruction Cannon'.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Sai
keyMoments.description: Ideo prepares to battle Sai after the latter defeats Kelly Funk.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up a clash between two skilled martial artists.

abilities.description: Ideo's punches create explosive impacts, earning him the epithet 'Destruction Cannon'.

reveals.information: Ideo is a member of the Longarm Tribe
